style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="150" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ihIauxjGxc4ByhBEbXCI-7"
